mapper.select: select count(*) from tb_notice where notice_status = 'Y'
select notice_no , notice_name , notice_writer , to_char(notice_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as "notice_date" from tb_notice where notice_status = 'Y' order by notice_no desc
mapper.update: update tb_notice set count = count + 1 where notice_no = #{noticeNo} and notice_status = 'Y'
